onlineAddresses.caption: Glamour: "Meet Fashion's Coolest Girl Boss Eva Chen"
Fashion: "Eva Chen, the Anna Wintour of the digital age?"

speakerBioSummary.text:
• Eva Chen is the head of fashion partnerships at Instagram, where she has launched a number of fashion and e-commerce features including shopping directly from influencers' feeds and the Instagram Shop account.
  • She is the New York Times-bestselling author of I Am Golden, A Is for Awesome, 3 2 1 Awesome!, Roxy, the Last Unisaurus Rex, and more.
  • Previously the editor-in-chief of Lucky, Eva has also written for ELLE, Vogue, Teen Vogue, Vogue China, the New York Times, and The Wall Street Journal.
  • Eva is a first-generation Chinese-American and attributes her early love of fashion to her mother's influence.

speakerBiography.text:
Eva Chen is a first-generation Chinese-American who grew up in New York City. She blames her deviation from pre-med at Johns Hopkins University on a love of fashion and beauty instilled in her by her mother, whose perfect bob and lipstick made a permanent imprint on her impressionable young mind. 

Previously the editor-in-chief of Lucky, Eva has also written for ELLE, Vogue, Teen Vogue, Vogue China, the New York Times, and The Wall Street Journal. She is currently the head of fashion partnerships at Instagram, where she is guilty of the occasional duck-face selfie. 

Eva lives in New York City with her husband and three children. She is the New York Times-bestselling author of Juno Valentine and the Magical Shoes; A Is for Awesome; Juno Valentine and the Fantastic Fashion Adventure; 3 2 1 Awesome!; Roxy, the Last Unisaurus Rex; Roxy the Unisaurus Rex Presents: Oh No! The Talent Show; Colors of Awesome!: 24 Bold Women Who Inspired the World; and I Am Golden.

speakerNameSubheading.text: Director of Fashion Partnerships at Instagram & NY Times Bestselling Author

speakerReview.text: The pleasure was all ours! Our team was ecstatic after the interview with Eva.
speakerReview.title: SPEAKER REVIEW
